data.title: Terrence Cooks Jr. - Football
data.meta_description:
Terrence  Cooks Jr. (12) LB  - 2023 | SOPHOMORE
Totaled four stops while playing in five games ... had a tackle for loss as part of two stops in the 36-13 win at
data.text:
2023 | SOPHOMORE

Totaled four stops while playing in five games ... had a tackle for loss as part of two stops in the 36-13 win at Houston ... recorded two solo tackles in the season opener against Colorado.

2022 | REDSHIRT FRESHMAN

Suffered a season-ending injury in preseason camp.

2021 | REDSHIRT (TEXAS)

Played in one game for the Longhorns ... saw action against Rice.

HIGH SCHOOL

Two-time all-district honoree and member of Shadow Creek’s undefeated 2019 5A Division 1 State Championship team … listed No. 44 on the Austin American-Statesman’s Fab 55 … ranked No. 209 nationally, No. 25 among outside linebackers and No. 33 in Texas by ESPN … rated No. 29 at his position and No. 56 in Texas by 247Sports … ranked No. 33 at his position and No. 52 in the state by Rivals … rated the No. 2 inside linebacker and No. 48 overall in the state by Dave Campbell’s Texas Football … a PrepStar Top 350 All-American ... selected second-team All-District 23-6A in 2020 … recorded 72 tackles, including 47 solo stops, nine tackles for loss, five sacks, seven pressures, two fumble recoveries and two forced fumbles as a senior … tallied 25 tackles, including 12 solo, three tackles for loss, one sack and a forced fumble against Pearland … helped Shadow Creek to an appearance in the 6A Division II regional playoffs in 2020 … a second-team honoree on Dave Campbell’s Texas Football Super Team in 2020 … selected second-team All-District 10-5A Division 1 in 2019 … notched 72 tackles, including 49 solo tackles, two tackles for loss and three forced fumbles as a junior … helped Shadow Creek to the 2019 5A Division I state championship with a 16-0 record, including a 7-0 district mark and title … played at Fulshear High School as a sophomore in 2018 … tabbed first-team All-District 13-4A Division I that year … played at Houston Christian as a freshman in 2017 … collected 39 tackles, including 4.5 for loss, 2.5 sacks, three pressures, three fumble recoveries, two forced fumbles and one blocked field goal … his father, Terrence Cooks Sr., played linebacker at Nicholls State and in the NFL for the New England Patriots.
